summary: Committed and motivated Administrative Assistant with exceptional customer service and decision making skills. Strong work ethic, professional demeanor and great initiative. Experienced in front-desk reception, office administration, data entry, spreadsheet development, and MS Office proficiency. Adaptable and self-directed, capable of multi-tasking in high-volume environments.

experience.title: Administrative Assistant/Site Clerk
experience.description: Managed receptionist area; greeted visitors; answered telephone and in-person requests for information; entered work orders; maintained front desk; used MS Word/Excel/PowerPoint/Outlook; organized filing systems; created and maintained spreadsheets with advanced Excel functions; coordinated supply orders; kept up-to-date with health inspections and site monitoring reviews; prepared new-hire packets and employee communications.

experience.title: Receptionist/Telephone Operator
experience.description: Answered phones and assisted with parental inquiries; performed general office duties; updated Powerschool and calendar; processed faxes and mail; supported attendance technician and nurse's office; managed daily office operations and receptionist duties.

experience.title: Receptionist/Administrative Assistant
experience.description: Answered phones, filed invoices, distributed mail; organized files, developed spreadsheets, and scanned documents; handled outgoing correspondence; supported general office duties and data entry.
